about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Dive into a world of horror where survival is a race against time. In this team-based multiplayer game, you will either play as a survivor desperately seeking freedom or as a relentless slasher hunting down your prey. Every match is a battle of life and death, where ingenuity, strategy, and adrenaline are your most valuable allies.

Survivors must cooperate to find jerrycans, power up generators, and activate a radio to call for police assistance. But beware—the slashers are always lurking, and they will not stop until all survivors have been eliminated. Will you be clever enough to escape the clutches of evil, or will you be the predator that brings terror to life?

A Dark and Merciless World

Explore eerie and unsettling environments, where every shadow may conceal danger. As a survivor, your ingenuity and teamwork will be your greatest weapons to outsmart the slashers. Communicate effectively, hide when necessary, and complete your objectives before time runs out.

If you play as a slasher, the hunt is your playground. Use your skills to track down your prey and prevent them from reaching their objectives. Every match is a new opportunity to spread terror.

A Constantly Evolving Game

Regular updates will enrich your experience with new maps, unique survivors and slashers, new weapons, and additional features. Each character, whether a survivor or a slasher, has unique abilities that influence their playstyle. The variety of choices and tactics makes every match intense and unique. Return often to discover new content and sharpen your strategy.

Become a Legend

Will you be the ultimate survivor who escapes despite all odds, or the legendary slasher whose name alone strikes fear? Complete objectives and unlock unique rewards that testify to your glory. You're about to live unforgettable moments… but will you live to tell the tale?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti or AMD R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080ti - AMD Radeon Rx Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space

short_description: A multiplayer horror game focused on cooperation and strategy. Survivors must unite to power generators and activate a radio to contact the police while escaping the slashers who hunt their prey.
